name: Snaek (Nesfero)
description:
Snek is a singleplayer, 2D action platformer with stealth elements! It's currently being worked on. While the game is under development you can pick up the most recent builds of it here. Once it is finished, the status of the game will be set from "Prototype" to "Released" and a suggested price of $5.00 will be placed.

Donations to Snek will be sent to the Children's Miracle Network Hospital, Children's National, in Washington, DC.
